text: Roure is a comune in the Metropolitan City of Turin in the Piedmont region in Italy. It is about west of Turin. Roure is next to these municipalities: Bussoleno, Coazze, Fenestrelle, Massello, Mattie, Perosa Argentina, Perrero, and San Giorio di Susa. == References == Category:Comunes of Turin
title: Roure, Piedmont
